title: Practitioner Competency Development Program for Database Utilization in a Flipped Learning Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational database concepts, language learning experience, and proficiency in online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Enhancing educational efficiency for current language field practitioners through the integration of flipped learning and database technology

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more database utilization strategies suitable for the flipped learning model.
Learners can perform practical tasks to systematically classify and manage language education content using SQL with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can independently operate a database-driven formative assessment tool in a virtual learning environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
